title: VR-Based Social Issue Inquiry and Practical Design Strategy

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social issues and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating real-life problem-solving skills through virtual simulations of social contexts, combining VR learning modules (via personal devices) with in-person workshops in a blended design.

learning_goals: Learners analyze social issues presented in VR environments and extract core causes with over 80% accuracy
Learners materialize and present solutions for social issues through VR simulation-based collaborative activities
Learners identify three or more educational barriers arising from technology use through reflective journals written after VR experiences
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
